fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.density

Class DoubleKMeans

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.density.DoubleKMeans
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DensityFunction<double[]>, java.io.Serializable

    public class DoubleKMeans
extends java.lang.Object
implements DensityFunction<double[]>
    Very basic KMeans algorithm with a shifting codeword procedure to ensure no empty cluster and balanced distortion
    Author:
    picard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
